com.xiaoleilu.hutool.date.format

类 FastDateFormat

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.text.Format
      • com.xiaoleilu.hutool.date.format.FastDateFormat
  • 所有已实现的接口:
    DateBasic, DateParser, DatePrinter, Serializable, Cloneable

    public class FastDateFormat
extends Format
implements DateParser, DatePrinter

    FastDateFormat 是一个线程安全的 SimpleDateFormat 实现。

    通过以下静态方法获得此对象:
    getInstance(String, TimeZone, Locale)
    getDateInstance(int, TimeZone, Locale)
    getTimeInstance(int, TimeZone, Locale)
    getDateTimeInstance(int, int, TimeZone, Locale)

    Thanks to Apache Commons Lang 3.5
    从以下版本开始:
    2.16.2
    另请参阅:
    序列化表格

    • 构造器详细资料

      • FastDateFormat

        protected FastDateFormat(String pattern,
              TimeZone timeZone,
              Locale locale)
        构造
        参数:
        pattern - 使用SimpleDateFormat 相同的日期格式
        timeZone - 非空时区 TimeZone
        locale - Locale 日期地理位置
        抛出:
        NullPointerException - if pattern, timeZone, or locale is null.

      • FastDateFormat

        protected FastDateFormat(String pattern,
              TimeZone timeZone,
              Locale locale,
              Date centuryStart)
        构造
        参数:
        pattern - 使用SimpleDateFormat 相同的日期格式
        timeZone - 非空时区 TimeZone
        locale - Locale 日期地理位置
        centuryStart - The start of the 100 year period to use as the "default century" for 2 digit year parsing. If centuryStart is null, defaults to now - 80 years
        抛出:
        NullPointerException - if pattern, timeZone, or locale is null.

      • format

        public <B extends Appendable> B format(long millis,
                              B buf)
        从接口复制的说明: DatePrinter

        Formats a millisecond long value into the supplied Appendable.

        指定者:
        format 在接口中 DatePrinter
        类型参数:
        B - the Appendable class type, usually StringBuilder or StringBuffer.
        参数:
        millis - the millisecond value to format
        buf - the buffer to format into
        返回:
        the specified string buffer

      • format

        public <B extends Appendable> B format(Date date,
                              B buf)
        从接口复制的说明: DatePrinter

        Formats a Date object into the supplied Appendable using a GregorianCalendar.

        指定者:
        format 在接口中 DatePrinter
        类型参数:
        B - the Appendable class type, usually StringBuilder or StringBuffer.
        参数:
        date - the date to format
        buf - the buffer to format into
        返回:
        the specified string buffer

      • format

        public <B extends Appendable> B format(Calendar calendar,
                              B buf)
        从接口复制的说明: DatePrinter

        Formats a Calendar object into the supplied Appendable.

        The TimeZone set on the Calendar is only used to adjust the time offset. The TimeZone specified during the construction of the Parser will determine the TimeZone used in the formatted string.
        指定者:
        format 在接口中 DatePrinter
        类型参数:
        B - the Appendable class type, usually StringBuilder or StringBuffer.
        参数:
        calendar - the calendar to format
        buf - the buffer to format into
        返回:
        the specified string buffer

      • parse

        public Date parse(String source)
           throws ParseException
        从接口复制的说明: DateParser
        将日期字符串解析并转换为 Date 对象
        等价于 DateFormat.parse(String)
        指定者:
        parse 在接口中 DateParser
        参数:
        source - 日期字符串
        返回:
        Date
        抛出:
        ParseException - 转换异常，被转换的字符串格式错误。

      • parse

        public Date parse(String source,
         ParsePosition pos)
        从接口复制的说明: DateParser
        将日期字符串解析并转换为 Date 对象
        等价于 DateFormat.parse(String, ParsePosition)
        指定者:
        parse 在接口中 DateParser
        参数:
        source - 日期字符串
        pos - ParsePosition
        返回:
        Date

      • parse

        public boolean parse(String source,
            ParsePosition pos,
            Calendar calendar)
        从接口复制的说明: DateParser
        根据给定格式转换日期字符串 Updates the Calendar with parsed fields. Upon success, the ParsePosition index is updated to indicate how much of the source text was consumed. Not all source text needs to be consumed. Upon parse failure, ParsePosition error index is updated to the offset of the source text which does not match the supplied format.
        指定者:
        parse 在接口中 DateParser
        参数:
        source - 被转换的日期字符串
        pos - 定义开始转换的位置，转换结束后更新转换到的位置
        calendar - The calendar into which to set parsed fields.
        返回:
        true, if source has been parsed (pos parsePosition is updated); otherwise false (and pos errorIndex is updated)

      • parseObject

        public Object parseObject(String source,
                 ParsePosition pos)
        从接口复制的说明: DateParser
        根据 ParsePosition 给定将日期字符串解析并转换为 Date 对象
        指定者:
        parseObject 在接口中 DateParser
        指定者:
        parseObject 在类中 Format
        参数:
        source - A String whose beginning should be parsed.
        pos - the parse position
        返回:
        a java.util.Date object
        另请参阅:
        DateFormat.parseObject(String, ParsePosition)
